title: Web Developer
description:
**Web Developer** 




**Location: Powai, Mumbai** 




**Experience: 4\\-6yrs** 




**Job type: Full time** 









**About Us** 




 All in Motion is a global creative production company. We serve leading businesses and brands across the world to meet their communications needs.¬†
 



 Our creative endeavours are underpinned by an empathy driven pursuit of emotions. Technology and all things digital excites us while culture helps us gain purpose.¬†
 



 We provide a broad spectrum of solutions from bespoke deliveries to integrated campaigns thanks to an award winning, involved in\\-house team.
 



  





**Job Description for Web Developer** 




 We are seeking a skilled Developer who is proficient in both front\\-end and back\\-end development. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications, working closely with our design teams to deliver user\\-friendly, performant, and scalable solutions.
 



 ¬†
 



 ¬†
 



**Key Responsibilities** 




 ¬†
 



**Front\\-End Development:** 



* Design, develop, and maintain responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
* Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
* Familiar with Webflow workflow to develop and manage existing websites.
* Collaborate with designers to implement user\\-friendly web applications.



  





**Back\\-End Development:** 



* Manage server\\-side logic, integrate APIs, and manage databases using technologies like Node.js, Python, Ruby, Java, or PHP.
* Manage and implement robust and scalable RESTful services and APIs.
* Maintain and optimize existing systems and ensure they run smoothly.



  





**Database Management:** 



* Manage databases (SQL, NoSQL) to support the application‚Äôs functionality.
* Optimize database performance, and ensure data security.



  





**Collaboration and Communication:** 



* Work closely with cross\\-functional teams including managers, designers, and other developers to define and deliver new features.
* Participate in code reviews, provide feedback, and maintain high code quality standards.
* Keep up with industry trends and best practices to ensure continuous improvement.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
* Proven experience as a Web Developer or similar role.
* Proficiency in front\\-end languages (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and frameworks (React, Angular, Vue.js).
* Strong experience with back\\-end languages (Node.js, Python, Ruby, Java, PHP) and frameworks.
* Experience with database technologies (SQL, NoSQL) and cloud services (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
* Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work in a fast\\-paced environment and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
* Strong communication and teamwork skills.

title: Full Stack Intern
description:
**About the Company** 




 Medikloud is an AI HMS SaaS platform that streamlines hospital workflows. We are actively seeking talented Full Stack Development Interns to join our team in Visakhapatnam. If you're proficient in backend programming languages such as Python, Node.js, Ruby, or Golang and have a passion for software development, this internship is for you.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 As a Full Stack Intern at Medikloud, you will work alongside our experienced team, contributing to the design, development, and optimization of backend systems. This internship offers hands\\-on experience with databases, APIs, authentication, deployment workflows, and server\\-side logic in a fast\\-paced SaaS environment.
 



  





  





**Responsibilities** 



* Design, build, and scale backend systems and microservices using Node.js.
* Develop and optimize REST/GraphQL APIs with strong focus on performance, security, and scalability.
* Work on database schema design, query optimization, and integrations with SQL/NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis).
* Contribute to system architecture, load handling, and fault\\-tolerant systems.
* Implement authentication, authorization, and data caching mechanisms.
* Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate APIs into React/Next.js interfaces.
* Participate in code reviews, CI/CD pipelines, and unit/integration testing.



  





  





**Qualifications** 



* Pursuing B.Tech / M.Tech.
* Strong proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and backend frameworks (Node.js, Express.js, or Nest.js).
* Good understanding of database systems, API design, and system architecture principles.
* Familiar with Docker, cloud deployment (AWS, GCP, or Vercel), and CI/CD workflows.
* Solid problem\\-solving, debugging, and optimization skills.
* Experience with AI\\-assisted coding tools (Cursor, Replit, Windsurf, etc.) is a plus.



  





**Equal Opportunity Statement** 




 We are committed to diversity and inclusivity.

title: Embedded Software Design Engineer ‚Äì Motor Controller
description:
Job Title: Embedded Software Design Engineer ‚Äì Motor Controller,29212
   

  

**Location:** 
 Pune (Baner)
   

  

**Experience:** 
 2‚Äì4 Years
   

  

**Employment Type:** 
 Individual Contributor (IC Role)
   

  

**Joining Time:** 
 Immediate to 90 Days
   

  

**CTC Range:** 
 ‚Çπ8‚Äì12 LPA (Negotiable based on interview performance)
   

  

**Relocation Support:** 
 Available
   

  

 Role Overview
   

  

 We are looking for an
 **Embedded Software Design Engineer ‚Äì Motor Controller** 
 with hands\\-on experience in motor controller algorithm design. The role involves developing, simulating, and optimizing motor control algorithms for EV and E\\-powertrain applications using modern control design tools.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Design and development of motor controller algorithms
* Development and simulation of motor control applications using tools such as MATLAB/Simulink
* Control system design, analysis, and validation for motor control applications
* Collaboration with hardware and system teams for controller integration
* Support testing, debugging, and performance optimization of motor control software
* Documentation of design, algorithms, and test results


 Must\\-Have Skill Set
   

  

* Minimum 2\\+ years of design experience in the motor controller / controller design industry
* Hands\\-on experience in motor controller algorithm design
* Strong knowledge of control systems design
* Proficiency in MATLAB/Simulink for motor control application development
* Understanding of embedded systems used in motor controllers
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree (BE/BTech) in:
+ Electronics
+ E\\&TC
+ Electrical/Electronics
+ Or a related engineering discipline


 Nice\\-to\\-Have Skill Set
   

  

* Experience in EV, E\\-Powertrain, or motor controller design environments
* Exposure to real\\-time implementation and testing of control algorithms
* Strong interest in electric mobility and power electronics
* Early joiners preferred


 Interview Process
   

  

* 2 rounds of interviews
* Technical assignment (if required)


 Skills: matlab/simulink,motor controller / controller design industry,embedded systems,control systems design,motor controller algorithm design

title: Graduate Engineering Trainee (Remote)
description:

 Are You Ready to Build the Future of Enterprise Tech?
 



  





 JobGo is looking for ambitious Graduate Software Developers to join our elite talent pipeline. This isn't just a "junior role"‚Äîit is a high\\-performance career accelerator. You will be embedded into the tech teams of

 , working on large\\-scale, full\\-stack projects that impact millions.
 



  





 If you are a truth\\-seeker, a fast learner, and someone who thrives on solving complex problems, this is your launchpad.

 and

 , and related frameworks.

* **Elite Exposure:** 
 Work with some of the biggest enterprise clients in Dubai‚Äîgain experience that usually takes years to acquire.

 Join a culture that values curiosity and truth\\-seeking. We reward performance and initiative.

 Structured onboarding and a half\\-year project cycle that ensures you are constantly learning and delivering.
* **Global Network:** 
 Build a professional network in one of the world's most dynamic tech hubs while working remotely.



  





 üìä
 **How We Measure Success** 




 Our selection process is rigorous, focusing on:

**Equal Opportunity Statement**

title: UI Developer
description:
**Job Description** 




**\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-\\-** 




  





 Job Description
 



 Designation\\- Software Development Engineer\\-II
 



 Position\\- UI Developer
 



 Location: Noida Sector 125
 



 Job Type\\- On demand/Contractual Basis
 



  





 Do you want to be a part of enabling the next wave of innovation in communication protocols,
 



 buildingsensors and cutting\\-edge hardware?
 



 Does working with IoT devices, sensors, wearables, controllers which can seamlessly merge the
 



 digitalworld with the physical world around us interests you?
 



 Who we are?
 



 We are Probus Smart Things and are working on IoT solutions that can be used to solve massive
 



 scaleproblems by connecting things to people.
 



 At Probus we are digitizing the electricity distribution grids to bring down network losses and
 



 ensurethat electricity reaches every house\\-hold.
 



 We do this by building sensors, controllers, low power edge devices, connect and manage multiple
 



 sensors with our ecosystem.
 



 Probus Smart Things has been awarded as the Startup of the Year 2018 and our wireless technology
 



 in2020, has been awarded by India Smart Grid Forum, Government of India.
 



 Probus has also been mentored by Cisco and Qualcomm in their startup accelerators.
 



 We are a Venture Capital funded company and have raised our A1 round series in 2025\\.
 



 We are looking for passionate electronics engineers to build the hardware that runs on edge
 



 computing, system on chips, communicates with cloud servers, server\\-less containers, and
 



 everything in between.
 



 We \\-
 



 ÔÇ∑ Are a team of technologists from diverse backgrounds
 



 ÔÇ∑ Obsess over design and product journey
 



 ÔÇ∑ Obsess over our customer‚Äôs needs and experience
 



 ÔÇ∑ Are owners. We love building new innovative technologies, and improving our existing ones
 



 ÔÇ∑ Wear multiple hats. We enjoy the prototyping and tinkering stages, as well as the
 



 rigor ofmaking solutions production\\-ready.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Are fast\\-growing, agile and collaborative
 



  





 You\\-
 



 ÔÇ∑ Enjoy seeing the impact your work has on real customers
 



 ÔÇ∑ Enjoy being a part of a creation that can shape the future of the world as we know it
 



 ÔÇ∑ Enjoy working with the cofounders and the founding team of a growing startup
 



 ÔÇ∑ Are comfortable in an agile environment and create order from ambiguity
 



 ÔÇ∑ Are excited about the incredible opportunity connected products represent
 



 ÔÇ∑ Build strong teams with others as passionate as you about this mission
 



 ÔÇ∑ Take ownership and doing whatever it takes to get the job done
 



 ÔÇ∑ Want to create applications at a massive scale used by millions of people
 



 ÔÇ∑ Use data to make decisions and validate assumptions
 



 ÔÇ∑ Learn from others and help grow those in your team to achieve their best
 



  





 Our Culture ‚Äì
 



 Trust ‚Äì We trust our team to the core in all their actions they perform in day\\-to\\-day work
 



 Clear Communication \\- We are direct and succinct. We share information efficiently, improving
 



 collaboration and productivity. We practice active listening.
 



 Efficient execution \\- We have a bias for action. We complete high quality work quickly. We focus
 



 on the20 percent of work that will get us 80 percent of the impact.
 



 Act like an owner \\- We take 100 percent responsibility for achieving the mission. We seek to improve
 



 allaspects of our company even in ways that are not explicitly part of our job.
 



 Continuous learning \\- We're humble, and value learning over being right. We embrace delivering
 



 andreceiving candid feedback, and see every setback as an opportunity to learn.
 



 Championship team \\- We are a winning team, not a family, and have high expectations for
 



 performanceand delivering results. We're stronger together so we choose to focus on what unites
 



 us, and not on whatdivides us. We have an intense work culture, and are regularly pushed out of
 



 our comfort zones. We takerest seriously, to improve productivity over the long term. Probus
 



 should continually earn employees' commitment and, likewise, expects employees to earn their
 



 seat at the company.
 



 Develop and maintain frontend applications using React.js, HTML, CSS, and
 



 JavaScript.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Build reusable components and libraries for scalable, responsive UI development.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Collaborate with backend engineers to integrate APIs and ensure end\\-to\\-end system
 



 functionality.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and cross\\-browser compatibility.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Participate in code reviews, debugging, and unit/integration testing to maintain high
 



 quality.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Work with Docker for frontend deployments.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Contribute to CI/CD pipelines using GitHub, Bitbucket, and related tools.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Collaborate with product managers and designers to translate requirements into technical
 



 solutions.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Stay updated on latest frontend technologies and propose improvements for adoption.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Provide mentorship to junior developers, while functioning as an individual contributor.
 



 Preferred Skills \\& Qualification\\-
 



 ÔÇ∑ Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science and Masters is an optional.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Experience required is 5 years.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Strong expertise in React.js.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/ES6\\+.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Experience with Node.js for frontend\\-backend integration.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Hands\\-on with Docker and containerized deployments.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Proficiency in Git, GitHub, Bitbucket for version control and collaboration.
 



 ÔÇ∑ Solid understanding of frontend performance optimization and responsive design.
 


* ÔÇ∑ Strong debugging, problem\\-solving, and analytical skills.

**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is a technology and innovation organization offering hands\\-on training and project\\-based internships in software development, web technologies, AI, data, and cybersecurity. The company focuses on bridging the gap between academic learning and industry requirements through live projects and expert mentorship.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Web Developer Intern, you will work on designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic websites and web applications. This internship is ideal for students or graduates who are passionate about coding, UI design, and building responsive web solutions from concept to deployment.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React.js, Bootstrap, or Tailwind CSS
* Work with backend technologies such as Node.js, Django, or PHP for full\\-stack development

**What You Will Gain**

**Who We Are**

description:
Job Title
   

  

**Senior Java Full Stack Lead (Java / Spring Boot / Angular),29177**
 Location
   

  

 Hyderabad, India (Hybrid ‚Äì 3 days office)
   

  

**Experience**
 8‚Äì12 years (with 2‚Äì3 years in a technical lead role)
   

  

 Employment Type
   

  

 Full\\-time
   

  

 Role Overview
   

  

 We are looking for a Senior Java Full Stack Lead with strong
 **architecture, design, and hands\\-on development** 
 expertise to lead a small team building
 **secure, enterprise\\-grade banking/financial applications** 
 . The role involves end\\-to\\-end ownership of solution design, development, integration, and client\\-facing technical discussions.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Lead and mentor a team of 4‚Äì8 engineers; provide technical direction and conduct code/design reviews
* Own solution, application, and integration architecture for Java full stack systems
* Design HLD and LLD focusing on scalability, performance, security, availability, and maintainability
* Translate business requirements into robust technical designs through domain analysis
* Communicate and justify architecture decisions, timelines, and trade\\-offs to stakeholders
* Design and manage integrations using REST APIs, SFTP/file\\-based interfaces, and third\\-party systems
* Ensure secure\\-by\\-design implementation aligned with OWASP and banking security standards
* Support deployment architectures for on\\-prem and hybrid environments


**Must\\-Have Skills**
* Java 11 / 17 (8‚Äì12 years)
* Spring Boot \\& Spring Security (8\\+ years)

**Nice\\-to\\-Have Skills**

**Additional Requirements**

title: General Interest Application
description:
**About Loti AI, Inc**
 Our names, our faces, our voices, our personas and our memories are some of the most fundamental things we call uniquely our own. We carry them throughout our lives and share versions of them with those we spend our limited time with. Loti‚Äôs mission is to make sure that who you are remains within your control. That everyone has the right to be remembered or forgotten and that technology should aid, not hinder, us in this effort. AI is a powerful tool, but we can‚Äôt let the hammer become the architect.
   

  

 Loti will promote human creativity and individuality by protecting those who share their gifts.
   

  

 At Loti AI, we‚Äôre building the infrastructure to protect digital identity at scale. Our platform helps public figures, creators, and brands safeguard their likeness and content across the internet. As AI\\-generated impersonation and deepfakes rise, we believe everyone should control how they show up online.
   

  

**Role And Responsibilities**
 Loti AI is a growing technology company working at the intersection of AI, digital identity, and digital rights. As we continue to scale, we‚Äôre always interested in connecting with thoughtful, curious people who are excited about the work we‚Äôre doing. If you don‚Äôt see an open role that aligns with your background right now, you‚Äôre welcome to submit a
 ****general interest application****
 . We review these applications as new opportunities open across the company.
   

  

**Who Should Apply**
* Candidates interested in future roles across:


- 

* Engineering
* Go\\-To\\-Market
* Product \\& Design
* Operations
* Marketing \\& Communications
* Research \\& Policy
* Finance \\& Administration
* People who want to be considered as the team grows


**What To Submit**
* Resume
* A brief note about your background, interests, the type of role you‚Äôre looking for, why you‚Äôre interested in Loti and why you should be on our team.


**What To Expect**
* Applications are reviewed on a rolling basis
* We may reach out if a role opens that aligns with your experience
* Submission does not guarantee an interview


****Why Join Loti AI?****
 At Loti AI, we are pioneering digital likeness protection and setting the highest standards in a rapidly evolving landscape.
   

  

* Dynamic, high\\-performance, ambitious culture where highly accountable individuals are empowered to take ownership, deliver impact and drive results.
* We‚Äôre creating an entirely new market that didn‚Äôt exist 10 years ago. With the proliferation of deepfakes and adoption of new legislation to combat them, we‚Äôre at the intersection of a critical need for both generative AI companies and high\\-profile individuals.
* You‚Äôll be joining us at a sweet spot where the company is still early but significantly de\\-risked.
* You will have ownership and strong influence over our core processes, directly driving success for Loti, our clients, our partners, and you.


****Loti AI is an equal opportunity employer.****
 We value diverse backgrounds, ideas, and lived experiences.
   

  

 Compensation offered will be determined by a number of factors including job\\-related knowledge, domain knowledge, skills, skill level, relevant years of experience, geographic location and interview performance.

title: Senior Test Automation Engineer
description:
**At Bayer we‚Äôre visionaries, driven to solve the world‚Äôs toughest challenges and striving for a world where ,Health for all, Hunger for none‚Äô is no longer a dream, but a real possibility. We‚Äôre doing it with energy, curiosity and sheer dedication, always learning from unique perspectives of those around us, expanding our thinking, growing our capabilities and redefining ‚Äòimpossible‚Äô. There are so many reasons to join us. If you‚Äôre hungry to build a varied and meaningful career in a community of brilliant and diverse minds to make a real difference, there‚Äôs only one choice.**
**Senior Test Automation Engineer**
**POSITION PURPOSE:**
 We are seeking a Senior Test Automation Engineer to lead the design and execution of automated testing strategies for cloud\\-native digital health platforms. This role requires strong hands\\-on experience in front\\-end, back\\-end, API, performance, and data validation testing. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to ensure software quality, reliability, and compliance with healthcare standards.
   

  

 As a senior engineer, a hands\\-on approach is essential, especially in building automation frameworks, writing test scripts, and mentoring junior QA engineers.
   

  

**YOUR TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES:**
* Design and implement automated test frameworks for web, mobile, and API layers
* Validate data pipelines, ETL processes, and data integrity across systems
* Conduct performance, security, and regression testing across environments
* Collaborate with developers, data engineers, and product teams to define test strategies
* Review data models, mappings, and architecture to create effective test plans
* Analyze test results, identify root causes, and manage defect resolution
* Ensure testing meets governance and compliance requirements
* Stay current with testing tools, methodologies, and healthcare QA standards
* Mentor junior QA engineers and contribute to agile sprints


**WHO YOU ARE:**
 Key Skills
   

  

* Automation Tools: Selenium, TestNG, JUnit, Playwright, Cypress
* API Testing: Postman, Rest Assured, SoapUI
* Performance Testing: JMeter, Gatling, LoadRunner
* Security Testing: OWASP, SAST/DAST tools
* Programming \\& Scripting: Python, Node.js, SQL
* Cloud Platforms: Google Cloud Platform (preferred) and at least one of AWS or Azure
* CI/CD \\& DevOps: Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, Jenkins
* Data Testing: ETL validation, data modeling, data warehouse testing
* Agile \\& Collaboration: Jira, Confluence, Scrum practices
* Compliance \\& Standards: HIPAA, GDPR, ISO 27001


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
* 5\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in test automation across multiple layers
* Experience with GCP (preferred) and either AWS or Azure
* Proven experience in regulated environments, preferably healthcare
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities


**Ever feel burnt out by bureaucracy? Us too. That's why we're changing the way we work\\- for higher productivity, faster innovation, and better results. We call it Dynamic Shared Ownership (DSO). Learn more about what DSO will mean for you in your new role here**
**https://www.bayer.com/enfstrategyfstrategy**
**Bayer does not charge any fees whatsoever for recruitment process. Please do not entertain such demand for payment by any individuals / entities in connection with recruitment with any Bayer Group entity(ies) worldwide under any pretext.**
**Please don‚Äôt rely upon any unsolicited email from email addresses not ending with domain name ‚Äúbayer.com‚Äù or job advertisements referring you to an email address that does not end with ‚Äúbayer.com‚Äù. For checking the authenticity of such emails or advertisement you may approach us at HROP\\_INDIA@BAYER.COM.**
**YOUR APPLICATION**
 Bayer is an equal opportunity employer that strongly values fairness and respect at work. We welcome applications from all individuals, regardless of race, religion, gender, age, physical characteristics, disability, sexual orientation etc. We are committed to treating all applicants fairly and avoiding discrimination.
   

  

**Location:** 
 India : Karnataka : Bangalore
   

  

**Division:** 
 Pharmaceuticals
   

  

**Reference Code:** 
 860043
   

  

**Contact Us**
* 022\\-25311234

title: Java Application Support
description:
Position Description
   

  

 Company Profile:
   

  

 Founded in 1976, CGI is among the largest independent IT and business consulting services firms in the world. With 94,000 consultants and professionals across the globe, CGI delivers an end\\-to\\-end portfolio of capabilities, from strategic IT and business consulting to systems integration, managed IT and business process services and intellectual property solutions. CGI works with clients through a local relationship model complemented by a global delivery network that helps clients digitally transform their organizations and accelerate results. CGI Fiscal 2024 reported revenue is CA$14\\.68 billion and CGI shares are listed on the TSX (GIB.A) and the NYSE (GIB). Learn more at cgi.com.

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

* Provide Level 2 production/application support for Java\\-based applications.
* Analyze application logs using Log4j, Splunk to identify and resolve issues.

* Debug application issues and collaborate with development teams.

* Support CI/CD pipelines, deployments, and cloud\\-based environments.

**Required Skills**
 Required qualifications to be successful in this role
   

  

* Strong proficiency in Java, SQL/Oracle, and Angular.
* Hands\\-on experience in Java production/application support (L2\\).
* Good understanding of SDLC, CI/CD, and cloud environments.

* Excellent analytical and problem\\-solving skills.


 \\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_

**Together, as owners, let‚Äôs turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you‚Äôll reach your full potential because‚Ä¶
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That‚Äôs why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company‚Äôs strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You‚Äôll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You‚Äôll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You‚Äôll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well\\-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team‚Äîone of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.

title: Sr IT Software Engineer
description:
**Why UKG**
 At UKG, the work you do matters. The code you ship, the decisions you make, and the care you show a customer all add up to real impact. Today, tens of millions of workers start and end their days with our workforce operating platform. Helping people get paid, grow in their careers, and shape the future of their industries. That‚Äôs what we do.
   

  

 We never stop learning. We never stop challenging the norm. We push for better, and we celebrate the wins along the way. Here, you‚Äôll get flexibility that‚Äôs real, benefits you can count on, and a team that succeeds together. Because at UKG, your work matters‚Äîand so do you.
   

  

 The ServiceNow P3 professional is an independent contributor responsible for configuring, developing, and supporting ServiceNow applications and integrations. The role requires solid platform knowledge, the ability to work with minimal supervision, and collaboration with business and technical stakeholders to deliver scalable solutions.
   

  

 \\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Design, configure, and develop ServiceNow solutions (e.g., ITSM, ITOM, SPM, WSD, EA)
* Build and maintain:
* Business Rules, Client Scripts, UI Policies, Script Includes
* Flows and Workflows (Flow Designer)
* Develop and support integrations using REST/SOAP APIs, MID Server, and Integration Hub
* Troubleshoot and resolve platform issues, performance bottlenecks, and defects
* Participate in requirements analysis and translate business needs into technical solutions
* Support upgrades, patches, and platform enhancements
* Ensure adherence to ServiceNow best practices and coding standards
* Create and maintain technical documentation
* Provide L3 support and mentor junior (P1/P2\\) team members as needed


 \\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_
   

  

**Required Skills \\& Experience**
* 6 to 8 years of hands\\-on ServiceNow platform implementation/development experience
* Strong knowledge of:
* JavaScript (server\\-side \\& client\\-side)
* ServiceNow data model (tables, CMDB basics)
* ACLs, roles, and security model
* Experience with at least any two major ServiceNow module (ITSM, ITOM, SPM, WSD, EA)
* Working knowledge of Agile/Scrum delivery models


 \\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_
   

  

**Preferred Qualifications**
* ServiceNow CSA
* ServiceNow CAD
* Two or more CIS certifications (ITSM, Discovery, SPM, etc.)
* Experience in enterprise\\-scale ServiceNow implementations
* Exposure to DevOps, ATF, or ServiceNow CI/CD pipelines


**Company Overview**
 UKG is the Workforce Operating Platform that puts workforce understanding to work. With the world's largest collection of workforce insights, and people\\-first AI, our ability to reveal unseen ways to build trust, amplify productivity, and empower talent, is unmatched. It's this expertise that equips our customers with the intelligence to solve any challenge in any industry ‚Äî because great organizations know their workforce is their competitive edge. Learn more at ukg.com.
   

  

 UKG is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and is committed to promoting diversity and inclusion in the workplace, including the recruitment process.
   

  

 Disability Accommodation in the Application and Interview Process
   

  

 For individuals with disabilities that need additional assistance at any point in the application and interview process, please email UKGCareers@ukg.com

title: Principal Software Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 If you are looking for a game\\-changing career, working for one of the world's leading financial institutions, you‚Äôve come to the right place.
   

  

 As a Principal Software Engineer at JPMorgan Chase within the Consumer \\& Community Banking, you provide expertise and engineering excellence as an integral part of an agile team to enhance, build, and deliver trusted market\\-leading technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. Leverage your advanced technical capabilities and collaborate with colleagues across the organization to drive best\\-in\\-class outcomes across various technologies to support one or more of the firm‚Äôs portfolios.
   

  

 Job Responsibilities
   

  

* Creates complex and scalable coding frameworks using appropriate software design frameworks
* Develops secure and high\\-quality production code, and reviews and debugs code written by others
* Architects and implements cloud\\-native platforms and infrastructure solutions at enterprise scale

**Required Qualifications, Capabilities And Skills**

title: Team Lead, Software Development( Dot net , Angular )
description:
We are looking for Software Engineer with 4\\-5 years of experience in Software Product development with following core attributes \\-
   

 \\* Strong product development experience and knowledge of product development processes
   

 \\* Strong technical skills with ability to own different feature areas of the product
   

 \\* Ability to work in parallel release cycles
   

 \\* Should have good communication skills to interact with the stakeholders and clear understanding of requirements
   

 \\* Ability to work in collaboration with teams from different geographical locations
   

 \\* Must worked on Microsoft .Net development platform and related technologies
   

  

 ¬∑ Knowledge of Amazon cloud is preferred
   

  

 ¬∑ Looking for full stack dotnet developer
   

 \\* Should have interest in system integrations, data exchange techniques
   

 \\* Knowledge of ERP systems and Business Processes is preferred
   

 \\* Excellent Communication Skills (Written, Verbal, team work and issue resolution)
   

 \\* Experience with microservices architecture, and event\\-driven design
   

 \\* Familiarity with security best practices in software development, such as OWASP guidelines, secure coding principles, and implementing authentication/authorization frameworks (e.g., OAuth, SAML, JWT).
   

 \\* Comfortable and experienced in agile development environments, demonstrating adaptability to evolving requirements and timelines while maintaining high productivity and focus on deliverables.
   

 \\*
   

  

 KEY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES¬∑
   

 \\* Development of different product features
   

 \\* Write comprehensive unit test cases
   

 \\* Assist Lead in spec review, UI mockup review, translating High level design to low level design, impact analysis and task estimates
   

 \\* Ensure code documentation (Inline, function / module level)
   

 \\* Enhancement and maintenance support of existing components
   

 \\* Ensure updates to code documentation
   

 \\* Assist in CI/CD pipeline and ensure product build is successful
   

 \\* Performs code walkthrough to ensure all code paths are covered, dead code is removed
   

 \\* Ensures sufficient instrumentation, logging for debug ability of code
   

 \\* Runs performance tests, optimizes code, eliminates memory leaks
   

 \\* Escalates to lead, manager when implementation deviates from specs, UI mockup
   

 \\* Debug and fix bugs arising during development and testing
   

 \\* Help Support team with Issue Diagnostic and Resolution
   

 \\* Communicate progress of allocated tasks periodically
   

 \\* Extensive experience in performance optimization and scalability, with a focus on designing high\\-performance systems and utilizing profiling tools and techniques to optimize both code and infrastructure for maximum efficiency
   

  

 TO BE SUCCESSFUL YOU NEED:
   

 \\* Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in a technical discipline
   

 \\* Minimum of 8 years‚Äô experience in software development
   

 \\* Good team player
   

 \\* Good Communication skills and ability to work with multiple teams
   

 \\* Technology hands on \\- Microsoft .NET \\- C\\#, ASP.Net, dotnet core, XML/XSL standards, SQL Server, JQuery, WebAPI and Web services
   

  

 \\* Good understanding of technology Python and machine learning
   

 \\* Knowledge of design patterns is essential
   

 \\* Configuration management tools Git, Oxford
   

 \\* Good understanding of AWS Cloud technologies like AWS Lambda, Step function, SQS and other
   

 \\* Good to have experience with Generative AI technologies, including working with frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face, and integrating AI/ML models into software application
   

  

 About Infor
   

  

 Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business\\-wide digital transformation.
   

 For more information visit www.infor.com
   

  

 Our Values
   

  

 At Infor, we strive for an environment that is founded on a business philosophy called \\[1] Principle Based Management‚Ñ¢ (PBM‚Ñ¢) and eight Guiding Principles: integrity, stewardship \\& compliance, transformation, principled entrepreneurship, knowledge, humility, respect, self\\-actualization. Increasing diversity is important to reflect our markets, customers, partners, and communities we serve in now and in the future.
   

  

 We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on PBM. Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM‚Ñ¢ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long\\-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.

title: Software Principal Engineer(C, Linux, Kernel, Device Drivers)
description:
**Software Principal Engineer**
 The Software Engineering team delivers next\\-generation application enhancements and new products for a changing world. Working at the cutting edge, we design and develop software for platforms, peripherals, applications and diagnostics ‚Äî all with the most advanced technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and the collaboration of internal and external partners.
   

  

 Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a
 **Software Principal Engineer on our Software Engineering Team in Pune location.**
**What You‚Äôll Achieve**
 As a Software Principal Engineer, you will be responsible for developing sophisticated systems and software based on the customer‚Äôs business goals, needs and general business environment creating software solutions.
   

  

**You will:**
* Contribute to the design and architecture of high\\-quality, complex systems and software/storage environments
* Prepare, review and evaluate software/storage specifications for products and systems
* Contribute to the development and implementation of test strategies for complex software products and systems/for storage products and systems


**Take the first step towards your dream career**
 Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here‚Äôs what we are looking for with this role:
   

  

**Essential Requirements**
* Experience in all phases of software development: feasibility, design, implementation, integration, test and delivery. Design, develop, and maintain Linux kernel\\-level device drivers for storage subsystems
* Expertise in Linux kernel, SCSI, SCST, Fiber Channel, Virtual Tape Libraries, I/O device drivers. Expertise in persistent memory, hardware assisted compression technologies
* Debug and resolve complex kernel and driver\\-level issues in production environments. Strong problem solving, troubleshooting, diagnostic skills
* Experience in one or more of the following languages: C, Python, Go. Knowledge of version control, bug tracking systems (Git, JIRA)
* Strong communication skills and an ability to articulate technical design while understanding business requirements, with the ability to debate and collaborate with other team members


**Desirable Requirements**
* Experience in Storage domain (SAN/NAS/Virtualization).
* Experience in developing software for software\\-defined infrastructure, including hybrid cloud/on\\-prem and multi\\-cloud environments.


**Who We Are**
 We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That‚Äôs why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you‚Äôre looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we‚Äôre looking for you.
   

  

 Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.
   

  

**Application closing date: 28 February 2026**
 Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. Read the full Equal Employment Opportunity Policy here.

title: Flutter Developer & Trainer
description:
**Company Description** 




**Uptech Infoway Pvt. Ltd.** 
 is a forward\\-thinking IT company that provides high\\-quality technology solutions tailored to businesses of all sizes. Specializing in custom software, web and mobile app development, UI/UX design, e\\-commerce solutions, and digital marketing, we help organizations accelerate digital transformation. Our expert team excels in delivering intuitive, scalable, and high\\-performing digital products while ensuring transparency, agility, and measurable business impact. With a global delivery model and client\\-centric approach, we prioritize creating lasting partnerships by turning innovative ideas into reality.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 We are seeking a skilled
 **Flutter Developer \\& Trainer** 
 for a full\\-time, on\\-site role based in Rajkot. The primary responsibilities include developing robust Flutter applications, maintaining and improving existing codebases, and delivering training sessions to junior developers. The role demands collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to design, build, and maintain highly interactive, scalable applications while ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Experience: 1\\-2 Years, Location: Rajkot Onsite
* Strong foundation in Computer Science principles, including data structures and algorithms.
* Proficiency in Mobile App Development and Software Development methodologies.
* Hands\\-on experience in Programming and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts.
* Expertise in Flutter framework and modern mobile application development practices.
* Excellent teaching and mentoring skills, with the ability to guide junior developers effectively.
* Strong problem\\-solving abilities and attention to detail.
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
* Prior experience in a training or mentoring role is a plus.
